title: Lynda - Up and Running with Box with Gini Courter Update Mar 5,
description:
Lynda - Up and Running with Box with Gini Courter Update Mar 5, 2015

Subjects:  Business, IT 
Software:  Box 

3h 14m Beginner Aug 29, 2014 Updated Mar 05, 2015 | Uploaded in Mar 18, 2015 by 2boweb


Box is an online file-sharing and cloud-content-management service for businesses. This course with Gini Courter will introduce you to Box and show you how to start a free personal account and begin storing and viewing files. She'll also demonstrate how to extend Box with Box Notes, take Box on the go, and upgrade to Box for BusinessÃ¢â‚¬â€the paid version of Box that comes with features like file versioning, embedding, and reporting. Plus, learn how to use Box for Office, which allows you to open, edit, and share Box files in Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.

Topics include:

	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Using Box Sync
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Using Box on mobile devices
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Upgrading to Box for Business
